description:
This course is designed to help you grow your Twitter account FAST with true followers so that you can maximize your influence and impact.

You'll learn who I messed up big time and got my account suspended by Twitter and how I couldn't grow my account past 1800 followers between 2009 - 2014. Then in 2015 I discovered how to use Twitter and how to follow the right people to grow my community. My account grew from 1800 to more than 11,000 followers in 5 months.

And my new followers were true followers. They began to engage with my tweets by hearting them, commenting and retweeting them. Not only that but Twitter became my #1 source of conversations on my website.

You'll discover how I did it and the tools I use that the experts use to, but that nobody talks about.

If you want to grow your influence with Twitter, this is a must have course!
title: Maximum Twitter Impact Course
